## **2\. Design Tokens (Colors & Typography)**

\<\!-- AI INSTRUCTION: Define the absolute source of truth for the project's colors and fonts. Developers MUST use these tokens (e.g., bg-primary) instead of hardcoding hex values (e.g., bg-\[\#0055ff\]). Fill out the table below. \--\>

### **2.1 Color Palette**

| Token Category | Tailwind Class / CSS Var | Hex / Value | Usage Context |
| :---- | :---- | :---- | :---- |
| **Primary (Brand)** | bg-primary, text-primary | \[e.g., \#2563EB\] | Main Call-to-Action buttons, active states, brand highlights. |
| **Secondary** | bg-secondary, text-secondary | \[e.g., \#F1F5F9\] | Secondary buttons, subtle backgrounds, card headers. |
| **Destructive (Error)** | bg-destructive, text-destructive | \[e.g., \#EF4444\] | Delete buttons, error text, critical alerts. |
| **Success** | bg-success, text-success | \[e.g., \#22C55E\] | Success toasts, completion checkmarks. |
| **Background** | bg-background | \[e.g., \#FFFFFF\] | Main application background (adapts in dark mode). |

### **2.2 Typography**

| Font Category | Font Family | Tailwind Class | Usage Context |
| :---- | :---- | :---- | :---- |
| **Primary/Sans** | \[e.g., Inter, sans-serif\] | font-sans | Default font for all paragraphs, inputs, and standard text. |
| **Heading/Display** | \[e.g., Cal Sans, sans-serif\] | font-heading | Page titles (H1, H2), marketing banners. |
| **Monospace** | \[e.g., JetBrains Mono\] | font-mono | Code blocks, API keys, IDs. |

## **3\. Base Component Standards**

\<\!-- AI INSTRUCTION: Define the constraints and allowed variants for the most heavily used UI components. This prevents developers from creating 10 different types of buttons. \--\>

Developers must use the pre-built components from the src/components/ui/ directory. Direct styling overrides should be minimal.

| Component | Allowed Variants | Strict Rules & Usage |
| :---- | :---- | :---- |
| **Button** | default, secondary, destructive, ghost, link | NEVER use disabled visually without preventing the onClick event. Always show a loading spinner if isLoading is true. |
| **Input / TextField** | default, error | Must always be paired with a \<Label\>. Use the error variant (red border) only when validation fails. |
| **Modal / Dialog** | default, alert | Must trap focus when open. Clicking outside the modal should close it (unless it contains a dirty form). |
| **Badge / Tag** | default, outline, success | Used for Kanban statuses or categories. Not clickable. |

## **4\. Third-Party UI Libraries (Strictly Allowed List)**

\<\!-- AI INSTRUCTION: To prevent package.json bloat, explicitly list the ONLY permitted third-party libraries for specific UI tasks (like icons, dates, or charts). If a library is NOT on this list, developers MUST ask for permission before installing it. \--\>

| UI Requirement | Approved Library | Example / Notes |
| :---- | :---- | :---- |
| **Icons** | \[e.g., lucide-react\] | Use \<IconName /\> from lucide-react. Do NOT use FontAwesome or Heroicons. |
| **Form Handling & Validation** | \[e.g., react-hook-form \+ zod\] | Strictly use Zod for schema validation. |
| **Date & Time Formatting** | \[e.g., date-fns\] | Use format(date, 'MMM dd, yyyy'). Do NOT install Moment.js. |
| **Charts & Graphs** | \[e.g., recharts\] | Used for dashboard analytics. |

## **5\. Accessibility (a11y) Constraints**

\<\!-- AI INSTRUCTION: List the non-negotiable accessibility rules for the frontend. \--\>

* **Keyboard Navigation:** All interactive elements (buttons, links, form inputs) MUST be reachable via the Tab key.  
* **ARIA Labels:** Any button that only contains an icon (e.g., a trash can icon for delete) MUST have an aria-label="Delete item" attribute.  
* **Color Contrast:** Text must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 against its background.
